law.catch_line: Should the managers for the time being fail to call an annual meeting of the landowners as aforesaid...
law.text: Should the managers for the time being fail to call an annual meeting of the landowners as aforesaid, or, such meeting having been called, should a quorum fail to be present, then in either case the board of county commissioners, upon proof being given, is authorized and directed to appoint a person or persons, to fill such a vacancy or vacancies on the board of managers.
